summary: A story about Quebec's most famous hockey player, Maurice "The Rocket" Richard, focusing on the struggles of a French Canadian in the National Hockey League dominated by Anglophones.
cast: Roy Dupuis|Stephen McHattie|Julie LeBreton|Philip Craig|Patrice Robitaille|Michel Barrette|Diane Lavallée|Tony Calabretta|François Langlois-Vallières|Pierre-François Legendre|Mario Jean|Robert Brouillette|Benoît Girard|Normand Chouinard|Paul Doucet|Randy Thomas|Mike Ricci|Vincent Lecavalier|Stéphane Quintal|Sean Avery|Ian Laperrière|Rémy Girard|René Gagnon|Amélie Richer|Maxime Veilleux|Luc Proulx|Serge Houde|Patrick Bernier|Sebastien Roberts|Alain Boucher|David-Olivier Gélinas|Gilles Marsolais|Jean-François Paré|Serge Bonin|Larry Day|Tedd Dillon|André-Sébastien Dorion|Pascal Dupuis|Alain Gauthier|Marc Gourdeau|Greg Goyer|Terry Haig|Tyler Hall|Albert Kwan|Gerardo Lo Dico|John Maclaren|Mathieu Morin|Steve Petitpas|Howard Rosenstein|Philippe Sauvé|Mylène St-Sauveur|Marc Tanguay|Allen Zarnett|Rick Bramucci|Pierre Gaudette
title: Maurice Richard
